review: If you're looking for something to protect your guitar until you can afford a good hard case, this is it. For the price, it has better padding than I expected and is equipped with carrying handles and a shoulder strap with metal buckles and snaps. Good deal for the price!
A good solid piece of equipment with great tone and control! It came extremely well packed. For the price, this is one great little dynamo!
A fine inexpensive assortment of thicknesses for the beginning guitarist to choose from.A great deal for a nominal amount of money.

A good solid piece of equipment! It sounds as good as it looks and it is absolutely beautiful! The description listed slight wear marks on the back, but I had to really look hard to find it (one). It came as well packed as a brand-new guitar and looks like one!

If all you're looking for is an inexpensive way to hang your guitar, until you can afford a good quality leather strap, this is it. The quality and function of the strap is actually better than I expected, for the amount paid.
It has a nice solid construction and a sturdy stance. Yet it folds flat to provide storage capability in a minimum of space.
